name: DeviceHub
description: SignalR Hub for real-time Device state streaming Handles client subscriptions using SignalR Groups

methods.name: SubscribeToDevice
methods.description: Subscribe to device state updates Client will receive real-time device state via "DeviceUpdate" event

clientEvents.description: Broadcasts device state changes including connection status, firmware version, and sensor assignments

name: MachineHub
description: SignalR Hub for real-time Machine data streaming Handles client subscriptions and provides machine aggregations

methods.name: GetMachineAggregation
methods.description: Get current machine aggregation (pre-computed OEE metrics)

methods.name: GetSubscriberCount
methods.description: Get current machine aggregation (pre-computed OEE metrics)

methods.name: SubscribeToMachine
methods.description: Subscribe to machine OEE updates Client will receive real-time machine data via "MachineUpdate" event

clientEvents.description: Broadcasts machine OEE updates including availability, performance, quality metrics
Broadcasts machine runtime blocks showing start/stop times and downtime reasons

name: MainHub
description: Main hub for handling client connections and group management.

methods.name: GetOnlineUsers
methods.description: Handles the connection of a user to the hub.

methods.name: ListenUserLogin
methods.description: Subscribes the current connection to the user login group.

methods.name: WidgetJoinGroups
methods.description: Subscribes the current connection to multiple widget groups.

name: SensorHub
description: SignalR Hub for real-time sensor data streaming. Clients can subscribe to sensor updates using SignalR Groups.

methods.name: SubscribeToSensor
methods.description: Subscribe to sensor updates. Client will receive real-time sensor data via "SensorDataUpdate" event

parameters.name: sensorId
parameters.description: The sensor ID to subscribe to

parameters.name: sensorId
parameters.description: The sensor ID to unsubscribe from

clientEvents.description: Broadcasts sensor data updates including min, max, average values and aggregations
